items.definition: To obtain enough food or money to stay alive
The act of preparing land and growing crops on it, or the act of growing a particular crop
A large farm, especially in a hot part of the world, on which a particular type of crop is grown
Control over a country or people
Loyalty and love or care for someone or something
To prevent something from being seen or known about
the particular type of character that a person naturally has
the set of conditions that provides a system in which something grows or develops
the process by which characteristics are given from a parent to their child through the genes
to admit something or say something publicly
